title: Apple reportedly considered Face ID for M1 iMac, future unclear
content:
There’s another feature that the revamped M1 iMac could have added: Face ID. According to Bloomberg‘s Mark Gurman in his latest edition of the Power On newsletter, Apple at least considered adding Face ID to the revamped iMac last year

more…

The post Apple reportedly considered Face ID for M1 iMac, future unclear appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: There's another feature that the revamped M1 iMac could've gotten: Face ID, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman in his Power On newsletter.
